db828506-7549-4128-bacd-a145e7ecd4f8.description: The earner of this badge completed the Antler Launch Academy course. Participants learnt from Antler's (global early-stage VC) unique startup generation and company building playbook. Antler's team of investors, venture builders, founders and industry guests hosted masterclasses covering the fundamentals of launching a startup. Participants gained an understanding of the characteristics of a VC-backable startup as well as methods to ideate, innovate, team, build, launch and grow.
db828506-7549-4128-bacd-a145e7ecd4f8.name: Antler Launch Academy

badge_template_activities.title: Participants were required to cover the majority of online masterclasses to achieve their digital credential. Example topics include: DNA of a Founder, Startup Ideas, Startup Teams, Building MVP's, Importance of Sales and Venture Capital Fundraising. The Antler investment team and founders also hosted regular live sessions & Q&A to share their perspectives on the content.

Each week participants were issued with optional 'weekly challenges' to progress their idea or startup. Examples included calculating market size (TAM, SAM, SOM), building an MVP with suggested tools and creating a final pitch deck.
Participants had opportunities to build their network and connect with others in the cohort with complementary skill sets to converse, consult & co-create throughout the course.
